text:

Disappointing.

text: Fast service and friendly staff. Pizza was hot and fresh. My wings were just right. Only flaw is the marinara now. It used to be thick but now it’s like water. Not sure why but they all seem to do this now days. But overall it was good.

text: Order was supposed to be ready at 5:15. It came out at 6:27. Don't use curbside.

text: Love Pizza Hut pizzas.  The poor server needed help and more utensils.  Severely understaffed.  A few people even left because she couldn't seat them fast enough.  She was running back and forth for plates, drinks, and silverware.  Still very friendly in spite of the chaos.

name: Josh Loredo
text: Staff were very friendly and helpful. The food came out great. The inside of the restaurant is clean and feels very laid back with a nice buffet too.

text: Very long wait times. Ordered a pizza with marinara sauce but was given barbecue sauce. Specified vegetarian but got meat pieces on the pizza. Called and they agreed to replace pizza. name: mary crume
text: Got there as soon as it opened up and nice setting, ok. Just wish buffet was a little more bigger with more options.  Pizzas not half n half topping. I dont eat pork or beef. But they were nice to cook my family a chicken pizza. Thank you for that.

text: I tried the lunch buffet and it was surprisingly  better than expected. Fresh and affordable, and the server, although working the entire dining room by herself, was on top of things. So you get all you can eat salad, pizza and pasta plus a drink for well under ten bucks. Great bargain.
